-- Stap 1: Maak externe data bron
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE MyDataLakeDataSource
WITH (
    TYPE = HADOOP,
    LOCATION = 'abfss://storagelaas.dfs.core.windows.net/boeken/books_data.csv',
    CREDENTIAL = MyDataLakeCredential
);

-- Stap 2: Maak externe tabel
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.ExternalBooksTable
(
    Title NVARCHAR(max),
    Description NVARCHAR(max),
    Authors NVARCHAR(max),
    Image NVARCHAR(max),
    PreviewLink NVARCHAR(max),
    Publisher NVARCHAR(max),
    PublishedDate NVARCHAR(max),
    InfoLink NVARCHAR(max),
    Categories NVARCHAR(max),
    RatingsCount INT
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://storagelaas.dfs.core.windows.net/boeken/books_data.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataLakeDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = CSVFileFormatName
);
